mapper.select: select * from job_ads where a_type = 0 and a_urgency = 0 order by a_number desc limit 0, 6
mapper.insert: insert into job_ads ( a_number, a_date, a_time, a_wage, a_urgency, a_status, ua_date, a_type, r_id, r_code ) values ( #{a_number}, #{a_date}, #{a_time}, #{a_wage}, #{a_urgency}, #{a_status}, #{ua_date}, #{a_type}, #{r_id}, #{r_code} )
